resources.string: High-quality equipment, professional water treatment, coffee of our own selection and roasting, years of experience, and most importantly and most valuable - people - this is why standard coffee tastes a little different. \n Black coffee, tea or coffee with milk, filter coffee or espresso - all done by great people and to high standards. Ask us what coffee you will drink today, because we love to share what we are excited about.
A wonderful establishment, food, coffee and tea - everything is done with heart. \n Very pleasant and professional staff.
Very tasty and high quality! \n A large selection of coffee beans, there is drip coffee, and the most important thing is that they can grind it for you for any device
Coffee is a craft. Every craft is a mastery. Ours is in this package. Enjoy sloooowly.
Qırım Tatar Aşları. Crimean Tatar cuisine.
Relaxed restaurant on 2 floors serving traditional cuisine with a modern twist, plus cocktails.
Family restaurant with a French atmosphere in the heart of the park
Leafy riverside paths, picnic lawns a paved maze, \n plus sporting facilities such as a soccer field
Sprawling national park featuring forest steppe landscapes, trails, ponds, playgrounds and eateries.
